meanings.definition: A person or group that supplies goods or services
meanings.sent1: The purveyors delivered fresh fruits and vegetables to the market.
meanings.sent2: Local purveyors offer a wide variety of handmade crafts at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The purveyors of laughter brought joy to the audience with their hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: She was a purveyor of knowledge, always sharing interesting facts with her friends.
meanings.sent5: The purveyors of hope spread positivity wherever they went.

meanings.sent1: The bakery purveyors baked delicious bread for the community.
meanings.sent2: She purveyors fresh flowers to decorate the event venue.
meanings.sent3: The chef purveyors a feast fit for a king at the royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: He purveyors wisdom to his students, guiding them through difficult problems.
meanings.sent5: The company purveyors high-quality products to customers around the world.
